author: abehazbunjr
title: Smart Contract Video Streaming
description: Centralized content platforms and artist management companies take advantage of creators as the sole gatekeepers to content monetization.
solution: Looking-Glass is a smart contract instance (per media) that enforces distribution rights and royalties as configured by the creators.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
